remarks: A specific multiplication in the module endormoprhism algebra. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
mendmulrfval.a $e |- A = ( MEndo ` M ) $.
mendmulrfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mendmulr.q $e |- .x. = ( .r ` A ) $.
mendmulr $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X o. Y ) ) $.
